The best Indian film in the last three decades. The movie has an enormous amount of darkness attached to it because of the novelty factor of the narrative. The expressions of Aishwarya Rai's face in the song "Behne de", Actor Vikram's characterization throughout the movie, the face off between the two lead male actor on a bridge depicted from each character's viewpoint are few notable mentions for this novel narrative. This is easily Abhishek Bachchan's best performance till date. These kinds of films will easily take Indian Cinema to greater heights. The movie is a must watch. I highly recommend it to everyone. Two thumbs way up.
